summary: An automatic out-of-office email reply from an FBI agent involved in the Epstein/Maxwell case, indicating they are unavailable until June 28, 2021, and directing urgent inquiries to another agent on the case.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the email subject line as part of the case inquiry.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in the email subject line alongside Epstein as part of the case inquiry.

connections.description: Both are named together as subjects of the case inquiry in the email subject line.

keyFacts: The email is an automatic out-of-office reply from an FBI agent working on the Epstein/Maxwell case.
The agent was unavailable from June 21, 2021, until June 28, 2021.
Urgent case inquiries were to be directed to another agent on the case, indicating an active investigation team.
The email subject line references an external inquiry regarding Epstein and Maxwell.
The document demonstrates ongoing FBI activity related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation in June 2021.
